chiefComplaint: What brings you in today related to your cough?
HPI: Is it a dry cough or are you coughing up phlegm?
Do you have any fever or chills?
Have you had any shortness of breath or chest pain?
Are there any triggers that make the cough worse?
PMH: Have you had similar symptoms in the past?
Do you have a history of asthma or lung disease?
Medications: Are you currently taking any medications for cough or allergies?
SH: Do you smoke or are you exposed to secondhand smoke?
Do you work in an environment with dust or chemicals?
FH: Is there any family history of asthma, allergies, or respiratory conditions?

Is the fever constant or does it come and go?
Do you have any chills, body aches, or sweating?
Have you traveled recently or been in contact with anyone sick?
PMH: Do you have any chronic illnesses or recurring infections?
Medications: Have you taken any fever-reducing medications?
SH: Do you live or work in close contact with others?
Have you been exposed to someone with a recent illness?
FH: Is there any family history of frequent fevers or immune disorders?
